title: Ocean Week and Patch Update
body:
It's so funny we fail to save Suva on the same exact day they run the patch update. Is the server was not shut down for so any hours, I surely believe that we would have secured another win.

Very unfair of Riot....

replies.body: Free mystery champion unlock as well. Very sus indeed.

> [{quoted}](name=chezwickcheese,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=OiqpeFXq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-28T21:48:52.869+0000)
>
> Free mystery champion unlock as well. Very sus indeed.

Not making the goal yesterday doesn't stop the Mystery Champion from being unlocked - if today is successful then it will be unlocked!

The point goal was adjusted before the start of the day due to the patch falling on Thursday.

The goal was also [reduced early in the day after the patch took longer than normal, as well as some issues that happened soon after the patch. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2LH0RBV-wow-this-ocean-week-day-is-going-slow-today?comment=00020000)

Nobody wanted to save my country, now our capital of Suva is destroyed. Well I am still glad I live in Nadi. Well happily enough seems like we did it. Everyone, specially Riot did an awesome job for Ocean's week.

(I am still sad Suva was destroyed though...)
